Wooden Yoyo (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) can be crafted using 10 Any Wood, 20 Cobweb at the Work Bench.
4 Spider Wall can be crafted using 1 Cobweb at the Work Bench and Ecto Mist (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
4 Spooky Wood Wall can be crafted using 1 Spooky Wood at the Work Bench.
Spooky Wood can be crafted using 4 Spooky Wood Wall at the Work Bench.
Berserker's Glove (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) can be crafted using 1 Power Glove, 1 Flesh Knuckles (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) at the Tinkerer's Workshop.
Bee Cloak can be crafted using 1 Honey Comb, 1 Star Cloak at the Tinkerer's Workshop.
